content: I'd like to know how you handle working in more than one branch in the compiler repository. Do you recompile rustc every single time you checkout to a new branch? Do you have more than one copy of the compiler locally?
I have a few checkouts of the compiler. I threw together a shell script, workman, to do it for me.

I have a few checkouts of the compiler. I threw together a shell script, workman, to do it for me.

that's great! thank you so much :D
